summary: The Thriving Communities Act of 2025 directs the Secretary of Transportation, in collaboration with the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development, to establish a grant program. This program provides technical assistance and capacity building to rapidly growing communities for transformative infrastructure projects. The bill mandates a report to the House Committee on Appropriations covering program methods, coordination between the Secretaries, and funding distribution metrics. It authorizes appropriations of $100 million for the Secretary of Transportation and $5.5 million for the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development.
